allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix [object Object] error in editorial board submit

The API returns errors as { error: { code, message } } but the frontend
was alerting error.error directly \(an object\). Now correctly extracts
the message string from errorData.error?.message with fallbacks.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
